name: Bone Devil
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.Devil's Sight: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.
traits.Magic Resistance: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.Multiattack: The devil makes three attacks: two with its claws and one with its sting.
actions.Claw: Melee Weapon Attack: +8+1d8 + 4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage.
actions.Sting: Melee Weapon Attack: +8+1d8 + 4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage plus 17 (5d6) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14+1d8 + 10 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
